comment._content: Terence, thank you for the feedback!  I'm glad I did it at the time, because to repeat it would take days of research to get all of that information back in my head again.

comment.author: 52371415@N08
comment._content: Great collection and excellent job by Brooklyn Museum of scanning these pictures.  They are clear, detailed and very informative.  And thanks to Rob Ketcherside for the annotations that made orienting myself within the pictures invaluable.  Thank you for this experience.
